snippet: Fearing leaks to high-speed traders, the government is overhauling its "lockup room," where news media wait to hear the latest inflation numbers, jobless rates and other critical economic data, John H. Cushman Jr. reported for The New York Times....
abstract: Fearing leaks to high-speed traders, the government is overhauling its "lockup room," where news media wait to hear the latest inflation numbers, jobless rates and other critical economic data, John H. Cushman Jr. reported for The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: Labor Dept. Tightens Security for Market-Sensitive Data
